verses.text: And Ahab had seventy sons in Samaria. And Jehu wrote letters , and sent to Samaria , unto the rulers of Jezreel , to the elders , and to them that brought up Ahab’s \add children\add*, saying ,\f + \fr 10.1 \ft them…: Heb. nourishers\f*
Now as soon as this letter cometh to you, seeing your master’s sons \add are\add* with you, and \add there are\add* with you chariots and horses , a fenced city also, and armour ;
Look even out the best and meetest of your master’s sons , and set \add him\add* on his father’s throne , and fight for your master’s house.
But they were exceedingly afraid , and said , Behold, two kings stood not before him: how then shall we stand ?

And he that \add was\add* over the house , and he that \add was\add* over the city , the elders also, and the bringers up \add of the children\add*, sent to Jehu , saying , We \add are\add* thy servants , and will do all that thou shalt bid us; we will not make any king : do thou \add that which is\add* good in thine eyes.

Then he wrote a letter the second time to them, saying , If ye \add be\add* mine, and \add if\add* ye will hearken unto my voice , take ye the heads of the men your master’s sons , and come to me to Jezreel by to morrow this time. Now the king’s sons , \add being\add* seventy persons , \add were\add* with the great men of the city , which brought them up.\f + \fr 10.6 \ft mine: Heb. for me\f*
And it came to pass, when the letter came to them, that they took the king’s sons , and slew seventy persons , and put their heads in baskets , and sent him \add them\add* to Jezreel. \p
¶ And there came a messenger , and told him, saying , They have brought the heads of the king’s sons. And he said , Lay ye them in two heaps at the entering in of the gate until the morning.

And it came to pass in the morning , that he went out , and stood , and said to all the people , Ye \add be\add* righteous : behold, I conspired against my master , and slew him: but who slew all these?

Know now that there shall fall unto the earth nothing of the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* spake concerning the house of Ahab : for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath done \add that\add* which he spake by his servant Elijah.  +  r 10.10  t by: Heb. by the hand of *

So Jehu slew all that remained of the house of Ahab in Jezreel , and all his great men , and his kinsfolks , and his priests , until he left him none remaining.\f + \fr 10.11 \ft kinsfolks: or, acquaintance\f* \p
¶ And he arose and departed , and came to Samaria. \add And\add* as he \add was\add* at the shearing house in the way ,\f + \fr 10.12 \ft shearing…: Heb. house of shepherds binding sheep\f*

Jehu met with the brethren of Ahaziah king of Judah , and said , Who \add are\add* ye? And they answered , We \add are\add* the brethren of Ahaziah ; and we go down to salute the children of the king and the children of the queen.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft met with: Heb. found\f*\f + \fr 10.13 \ft to salute…: Heb. to the peace of, etc\f*
And he said , Take them alive. And they took them alive , and slew them at the pit of the shearing house , \add even\add* two and forty men ; neither left he any of them. \p

¶ And when he was departed thence, he lighted on Jehonadab the son of Rechab \add coming\add* to meet him: and he saluted him, and said to him, Is thine heart right , as my heart \add is\add* with thy heart ? And Jehonadab answered , It is. If it be, give \add me\add* thine hand. And he gave \add him\add* his hand ; and he took him up to him into the chariot.\f + \fr 10.15 \ft lighted on: Heb. found\f*\f + \fr 10.15 \ft saluted: Heb. blessed\f*
And he said , Come with me, and see my zeal for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. So they made him ride in his chariot.

And when he came to Samaria , he slew all that remained unto Ahab in Samaria , till he had destroyed him, according to the saying of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he spake to Elijah. \p
¶ And Jehu gathered all the people together , and said unto them, Ahab served Baal a little ; \add but\add* Jehu shall serve him much.

Now therefore call unto me all the prophets of Baal , all his servants , and all his priests ; let none be wanting : for I have a great sacrifice \add to do\add* to Baal ; whosoever shall be wanting , he shall not live. But Jehu did \add it\add* in subtilty , to the intent that he might destroy the worshippers of Baal.
And Jehu said , Proclaim a solemn assembly for Baal. And they proclaimed \add it\add*.\f + \fr 10.20 \ft Proclaim: Heb. Sanctify\f*

And Jehu sent through all Israel : and all the worshippers of Baal came , so that there was not a man left that came not. And they came into the house of Baal ; and the house of Baal was full from one end to another.\f + \fr 10.21 \ft full…: or, so full that they stood mouth to mouth\f*
And he said unto him that \add was\add* over the vestry , Bring forth vestments for all the worshippers of Baal. And he brought them forth vestments.

And Jehu went , and Jehonadab the son of Rechab , into the house of Baal , and said unto the worshippers of Baal , Search , and look that there be here with you none of the servants of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, but the worshippers of Baal only.

And when they went in to offer sacrifices and burnt offerings , Jehu appointed fourscore men without , and said , \add If\add* any of the men whom I have brought into your hands escape , \add he that letteth him go\add*, his life \add shall be\add* for the life of him.

And it came to pass, as soon as he had made an end of offering the burnt offering , that Jehu said to the guard and to the captains , Go in , \add and\add* slay them; let none come forth. And they smote them with the edge of the sword ; and the guard and the captains cast \add them\add* out , and went to the city of the house of Baal.\f + \fr 10.25 \ft the edge: Heb. the mouth\f*
And they brought forth the images out of the house of Baal , and burned them.\f + \fr 10.26 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*
And they brake down the image of Baal , and brake down the house of Baal , and made it a draught house unto this day.
Thus Jehu destroyed Baal out of Israel. \p

¶ Howbeit \add from\add* the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat , who made Israel to sin , Jehu departed not from after them, \add to wit\add*, the golden calves that \add were\add* in Beth-el , and that \add were\add* in Dan.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto Jehu , Because thou hast done well in executing \add that which is\add* right in mine eyes , \add and\add* hast done unto the house of Ahab according to all that \add was\add* in mine heart , thy children of the fourth \add generation\add* shall sit on the throne of Israel.

But Jehu took no heed to walk in the law of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel with all his heart : for he departed not from the sins of Jeroboam , which made Israel to sin.\f + \fr 10.31 \ft took…: Heb. observed not\f* \p
¶ In those days the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* began to cut Israel short : and Hazael smote them in all the coasts of Israel ;\f + \fr 10.32 \ft to cut: Heb. to cut off the ends\f*

From Jordan eastward , all the land of Gilead , the Gadites , and the Reubenites , and the Manassites , from Aroer , which \add is\add* by the river Arnon , even Gilead and Bashan.\f + \fr 10.33 \ft eastward: Heb. toward the rising of the sun\f*\f + \fr 10.33 \ft even…: or, even to Gilead and Bashan\f*
Now the rest of the acts of Jehu , and all that he did , and all his might , \add are\add* they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel ?
And Jehu slept with his fathers : and they buried him in Samaria. And Jehoahaz his son reigned in his stead.
And the time that Jehu reigned over Israel in Samaria \add was\add* twenty and eight years.\f + \fr 10.36 \ft the time: Heb. the days were\f*
